item.description: Swing danceing with lessens. This is very fun and not intimidating, someone will ask you to dance or you can ask anyone to dance. This is very friendly atmosphere with great people. Come dont feel that you need to swing dance it is just a fun night out! see web site http://www.swingin88s.com/s88bridge.html admission $8.00
item.why: David S will be Hosting this event tonight for me. Please note his picture to find him. Sorry I will miss meeting all of you but hope to at another time. Generated many members to this event and hope to have eveyone show?? Lessons are at 7:15

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Dancing at the Brightridge club
